connectfour

Interface ConnectFourListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectFourSwing, FactoryTestC.Observer1, FactoryTestC.Observer2, MultiPlayerGameTest, SinglePlayerGameTest

    public interface ConnectFourListener
    An object that can be to represent a ConnectFourGame. The ConnectFour objects are created in the ConnectFourFactory. Different implementers of this class can share a single game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chipInserted(chipColor c, int i, int j)
      notifies that a chip has been inserted and gives the position in the board
      void gameStart()
      notifies the ConnectFour game has started.
      void gameWon(int[][] winningMove, chipColor c)
      notifies which color chip wins the game and gives the chip positions in the board

    • Method Detail

      • gameStart

        void gameStart()
        notifies the ConnectFour game has started.

      • chipInserted

        void chipInserted(chipColor c,
                  int i,
                  int j)
        notifies that a chip has been inserted and gives the position in the board
        Parameters:
        c - chipColor
        i - row to place chip
        j - columnt to place chip

      • gameWon

        void gameWon(int[][] winningMove,
             chipColor c)
        notifies which color chip wins the game and gives the chip positions in the board
        Parameters:
        winningMove - is a 2d array the of 2columns and 4 rows columns 0 contain the row indexes columns 1 contain the column indexes paired by row of the winning move
        c - the chip color of the winner
